title: Bridge
description: Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Unclasp your hands, then exhale to lower. Bring feet hip-width apart Align knees over ankles Lengthen tailbone toward knees Modification: Keep arms flat on the floor to lessen the stretch in the shoulders.
